dialogue.content: What is the status of my order?

Could you please provide your order ID in the following format: XXX-XXXXXXX (all digits)?
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
Your order status is: Cancelled.
I want to talk to a human.

I understand your request for real person interaction. Could you please provide your full name first?
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
Solomon Elgaev

Thank you. Please provide your email address.
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
I'd like to interact with a live person.

I understand your request for real person interaction. Could you please provide your full name first?
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
John Doe

Thank you. Please provide your email address.
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
johndoe@example.com

Great. Finally, please provide your phone number. It should contain 10 digits only, starting with 05..
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.

Could you please provide your order ID in the following format: XXX-XXXXXXX (all digits)?
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
Sorry, I couldn't find an order with that ID.

Call a human to this chat.

solio

Great. Finally, please provide your phone number. It should contain 10 digits only, starting with 05..

The phone number '0551234' is not valid. Please provide a valid 10-digit phone number.
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.

Switch to human associate.

If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
cancel

How many days can pass since the purchase so that I can still return it. Give me only number

Mastercard, Visa, AMEX, Discovery
How to learn about items I bought at the store?

If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.

What have you done with my purchase?

Could you please provide your order ID in the following format: XXX-XXXXXXX (all digits)?
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
Your order status is: Shipped.

Could you please provide your order ID in the following format: XXX-XXXXXXX (all digits)?
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
Your order status is: On-hold.
Can you help me, i have an order inquiry?

Could you please provide your order ID in the following format: XXX-XXXXXXX (all digits)?
If you do not wish to continue with the process, type 'cancel'.
Your order status is: Confirmed.
What do I need to bring as proof of purchase when returning items. Answer using single word (noun).
Receipt
Can I return a clearance item? Answer either 'Yes' or 'No'
No
In which condition should be items to be returned? Answer using one adjective
Original
Can I return clothes? Answer either 'Yes' or 'No'
Yes
Up to how many days can express shipping be delivered. Give me only number
Up to how many days can standard shipping be delivered. Give me only number
